title.rendered: Top 18 B2B eCommerce Development Companies in 2025

content.rendered:
The demand for sophisticated and personalized eCommerce capabilities continues to grow, with a global B2B eCommerce market valued at USD$36 trillion by 2026. Industries such as energy, healthcare, manufacturing, and professional business services are leading this growth, making B2B eCommerce platforms essential for businesses aiming to remain competitive. 

Partnering with a reliable B2B eCommerce development company is critical for building robust eCommerce platforms that streamline operations and deliver value. To help you find the ideal match, we’ve compiled a list of the Top 18 B2B eCommerce Development Companies for 2025, chosen based on expertise, industry experience, and client feedback.

Let’s explore these companies, which have a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and can be trusted to help your business succeed in eCommerce.

Top B2B eCommerce Development Companies In India

Have a look at the sorted list of top B2B eCommerce companies given below:

1. PixelCrayons

As a leading B2B eCommerce development company in India, PixelCrayons has been delivering innovative and robust eCommerce solutions for over 20 years. The company crafts bespoke online stores with user-friendly interfaces and robust functionalities using platforms like Magento, Shopify, WooCommerce, and custom frameworks.

Its client list includes renowned brands such as Puma, Qatar Airways, and Vodafone. PixelCrayons has received praise for developing eCommerce websites and apps that support bulk ordering, complex pricing models, and advanced inventory management.

Website: www.pixelcrayons.com

Specialized Services: Software development services, eCommerce Services, Mobile app development, B2B eCommerce technology, B2B eCommerce with predictive analytics

Also read: Leading B2B eCommerce Platforms

2. invertio

Certified with ISO 9001:2015, invertio is a renowned B2B eCommerce development company that ensures top-tier quality and information security standards.

Backed by over 450 skilled developers, the company specializes in custom B2B eCommerce solutions using platforms like Magento, Shopify Plus, and WooCommerce.

ValueCoder’s focus on seamless integration, headless commerce solutions, and ongoing maintenance support makes it a trusted partner for businesses looking to improve their online operations.

Website: www.invertio.in

Specialized Services: eCommerce development, Software development services, Mobile app development, B2B eCommerce integration services, B2B eCommerce logistics

Revive Your B2B eCommerce Experience!

Use our top-notch development services for seamless, scalable solutions.

Contact Us

3. VerveLogic

Vervelogic is a premier eCommerce development company in India that offers a wide range of services, including eCommerce website development, mobile eCommerce development, and digital marketing services.

They specialize in creating custom eCommerce solutions for businesses of all sizes and industries. Vervelogic has an excellent reputation for providing high-quality services and delivering successful projects on time and within budget.

Website: www.vervelogic.com

Specialized Services: eCommerce development, Mobile application development, Responsive website development, Digital marketing, SEO services

4. Octal IT Solution

Octal IT Solution is one of the best B2B eCommerce companies in India. They offer a host of digital transformation services to help businesses succeed online, including eCommerce applications and mobile apps for both iOS and Android devices.

Moreover, the corporation includes a team that has extensive experience working with various B2B eCommerce trends, from AI to Blockchain.

Website: www.octalsoftware.com

Specialized Services: Mobile Application Development, Web Design and Development, Microsoft Solutions, Custom Software Development, SaaS Development, Enterprise Solutions, Digital Marketing, and more.

Build a B2B eCommerce Platform That Converts

Minimize cart abandonment and boost engagement with custom B2B eCommerce platforms.

Contact Us

5. Webnexs

Webnexs is a top-notch eCommerce development company. The organization’s eCommerce website developers have years of experience developing customized eCommerce online stores.

Moreover, their offshore eCommerce team focuses on creating quality applications and offering digital marketing solutions for its clients.

Website: www.webnexs.com

Specialized Services: Magento, Android app development, iOS, digital marketing, Video on demand, Live streaming, Ride-Hailing Script, Tracking Script, eCommerce development services, Magento Migration, App Development, and more.

Also read: B2B vs. B2C: Choosing the Right Business Model

6. Fluper Ltd

Fluper Ltd is a leading eCommerce development company that has been around for over a decade. The firm offers customers a complete package of solutions, including custom website design, web development, and mobile app development.

Moreover, their B2B eCommerce pricing and highly skilled team make them stand out from the crowd, which can work on any project , be it an eCommerce site or a social media campaign.

Website: www.fluper.com

Specialized Services: Web & Mobile App Designing, eCommerce App Development, CMS Development, ERP Apps Development, iOS and Android App Development, PHP Development, Java Development, Cross-platform app development, Augmented Reality Apps, and more.

7. 7EDGE

Being a top-notch eCommerce website development company, 7EDGE has a team of talented eCommerce web developers who are passionate about creating innovative online shopping websites.

Moreover, the corporation professionals can help you develop an integrated website to increase your business revenue exponentially!

Website: www.7edge.com

Specialized Services: Marketing Cloud, Consulting, Digital Marketing, Digital Media, Web Solutions, Mobility Solutions, DevOps, Big Data, Analytics, Internet of Things (IoT), Cloud Computing, Automation, Artificial Intelligence, SMAC, Digital Transformation, and more.

8. SeatGeek

SeatGeek is the leading mobile-focused ticket platform that enables fans to buy and sell tickets for sports, concerts, and theatre events.

It is powering a new, open entertainment industry where fans have effortless access to experiences, and teams, venues, and shows have seamless access to their audiences.

Website: https://seatgeek.com/

Specialized Services: Point of Sale (POS) system, B2B eCommerce services, Web development services, Enterprise solutions

9. Digital Silk

Digital Silk is a top eCommerce development company you would find. It is adept at developing and creating outstanding digital marketing services.

Moreover, you can drive as a website is the reflection of your business. They prioritize your eCommerce development projects to a spike in user traffic with a  focus on user engagement.

Website: www.digitalsilk.com

Specialized Services: eCommerce development, Web & mobile application development, Digital marketing, SEO services

10. Dynamic Dreamz

Dynamic Dreamz is an eCommerce development company that offers a range of services. They are experts at web design, custom website development, and online marketing strategies using SEO/SEM techniques.

Moreover, their eCommerce development team has years of experience working on Magento and B2B eCommerce platforms, which means they can build your site from the ground up or help with any customization you require.

Website: www.dynamicdreamz.com

Specialized Services: Web Design & Development, eCommerce Development, Android app development, Responsive Website Design, Magento, WordPress development, eCommerce development, Laravel, PHP, and more.

Also read: Top eCommerce Development Companies in India

11. BlueTech Research

BlueTech Research is a reliable eCommerce development company offering solutions for all your online business demands. The firm’s eCommerce developers have created projects of all sizes.

Moreover, the firm’s development team is so talented that it can easily handle projects for startups, SMEs, and large enterprises.

Website: www.bluetechresearch.com

Specialized Services: Custom app development, iOS application development, Android app development, eCommerce development services, UI/UX design, mobile app development, Java, PHP, Magneto web app development, and more.

Drive Growth with Scalable B2B Solutions

Let us build a platform that grows with your business and customer demand.

Contact Us

12. Crafty

Crafty is a centralized platform for workplaces to manage food, beverages, and supplies for their in-office, remote, and hybrid teams worldwide. Their mission is to help companies create better workplaces.

From G2 to CME Group to Yelp, they work with the world’s biggest brands to harness the power of food and beverage to foster a culture of employee connectivity and increase workplace productivity.

Headquartered in Chicago, with offices in New York City and the Bay Area, Crafty manages over 260 global client offices and serves over 300,000 employees per month.

Website: www.craftydelivers.com/

Specialized Services: B2B eCommerce services, Software development services, eCommerce app development

13. Kadam Technologies Pvt. Ltd

Kadam Technologies is a top-notch eCommerce development company specializing in Magento, WordPress, and Shopify platforms. The organization has achieved massive success for its clients worldwide, who have trusted it with all of their online business needs.

Whether you’re looking to start from scratch or develop your existing online store, Kadam provides you with eCommerce website developers in India to assist you through every stage of the process.

Website: www.kadamtech.com

Specialized Services: Web and Mobile development, eCommerce Application, front-end development, eCommerce development services, CRM solution development, Healthcare solution development, Digital Marketing, and more.

14. Cirkle Studio

Cirkle Studio is an outstanding eCommerce web design company that offers businesses comprehensive solutions related to eCommerce website development at very affordable prices.

Moreover, the corporation has a pool of talented and experienced professionals, which allows them to work on any eCommerce website development project.

Website: www.cirklestudio.co

Specialized Services: UI/UX Design, Web Application Development, Mobile Apps Design, Quality Assurance Services, Mobile Apps Development, eCommerce website development service, Digital Marketing, Internet Marketing Service, Digital Service, and more.

15. Mxpertz

Mxpertz offers a wide range of eCommerce website development services that can be tailored to suit your business’s unique needs.

They have been providing web design and custom software solutions for around three years now, which makes them one of the most experienced digital agencies in India!

Website: www.mxpertz.com

Specialized Services: Information technology, Web development, Software engineering, Mobile app development, eCommerce app development, Custom software development, and more.

16. BrancoSoft Private Limited

BrancoSoft is an outstanding eCommerce development company that specializes in custom-built online stores.

The firm has been around since 2012, and its eCommerce developers have delivered multiple projects for various enterprises globally, including those from India.

Website: www.brancosoft.com

Specialized Services: Website Development, Digital Marketing, Business Analysis, iOS App Development, Designing, Strategy & Consulting, Brand Strategy, SEO, Social media marketing, and more.

Also read: AI Revolutionizing eCommerce

17. Magneto IT Solutions

Magneto IT Solutions is an Indian eCommerce Development Company that offers a host of services to its clients. They believe in providing scalable, user-friendly websites at competitive prices.

Moreover, the company has over ten years of experience working with businesses nationwide! Their team consists of highly skilled eCommerce developers who work hard to meet your business goals.

Website: www.magnetoitsolutions.com

Specialized Services: Yii Development, PHP Development, iOS and Android Apps Development, Responsive Web Design, Custom eCommerce Solutions, WordPress development, Digital Marketing, PPC, SEO, Ionic Development, and more.

Offer a Tailored Shopping Experience

Deliver personalized user journeys with features like advanced search, AI-driven recommendations, and real-time inventory.

Contact Us

18. Icecube Digital

Icecube Digital is a leading eCommerce website development company. The firm offers custom-built eCommerce websites that can fully integrate with your existing business processes.

In addition, the organization’s eCommerce app developers are highly skilled and have already worked on various platforms such as Magento, Drupal, and WordPress, which means they can build highly complex online stores for businesses in any industry, not just fashion or electronics.

Website: www.icecubedigital.com

Specialized Services: iOS app development, Responsive web design, Magento Development, Shopify Development, WordPress Development, Mobile App Development, Typo3 Development, PHP Development, SEO, and so on.

How Can You Choose the Best B2B eCommerce Companies?

Selecting top B2B eCommerce companies from the above list ensures your company is optimized for long-term success. To choose the right eCommerce development company for your business, consider the following:

  • Expertise Alignment: Ensure the eCommerce development company’s experience and expertise align with your business goals and industry needs.
  • Customization Capabilities: Look for a partner offering tailored solutions to your unique processes and requirements.
  • Comprehensive Support: Prioritize partners offering ongoing support, including troubleshooting and updates.
  • Long-Term Partnership: Focus on building a relationship with a partner committed to your growth and success over the long term.

Also read: Everything You Need To Know About Magento 2 Multi-Vendor Marketplace

Which eCommerce Development Company Will You Choose?

Selecting the right B2B eCommerce firm can significantly impact your business. The right partner enhances innovation, boosts efficiency, and drives performance.

A well-tailored solution crafted by eCommerce experts ensures success, while generic approaches may lead to missed opportunities and struggles. Your decision entirely depends on your business needs, project scope, budget, and expectations for expertise.

Carefully weigh your options, as your choice can differentiate between innovating and stagnating.

Contact us for B2B eCommerce development solutions that meet your specific needs and enhance your operational efficiency.
